pkgmetadata.longdescription: aiojson=======|pipeline status| |coverage report| |pypi link|.. |coverage report| image:: https://git.yurzs.dev/yurzs/aiojson/badges/master/coverage.svg :target: https://git.yurzs.dev/yurzs/aiojson/-/commits/master.. |pipeline status| image:: https://git.yurzs.dev/yurzs/aiojson/badges/master/pipeline.svg :target: https://git.yurzs.dev/yurzs/aiojson/-/commits/master.. |pypi link| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/aiojson.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/aiojsonSimple json template verifier for ``aiohttp``Usage-----Simple example:.. code-block:: python from aiohttp import JsonTemplate @JsonTemplate({ "messages": [{ "id": int, "text": str }]) async def received_message(request, validated_data): pass
